title: Kalista crib or kite build?
body: With the buffs on I.E., is it build to build crib on Kali or to keep building kite with the bloodthirster?

replies.body: Kalista is still going to want to prioritize attack speed and life steal. IE can be bought but more as a 5th or 6th item.
Okay thank you. Why exactly is this though? Im new to Kalista.

More attack speed means more hopping and kiting and more rend stacks.

Life steal means even if they get onto you, it'll still be difficult to kill you anyways.

Most of Kalista's damage is loaded into her rend stack, of which, crit doesn't impact.
I see. Thank you. I just build this in my last game. Is this a decent build? {{item:3085}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3036}}

I'm not knowledgeable about the exact specifics of a correct build with an ADC so I can't give you too much feedback here, sorry. It looks like you have the right items though, only item which really is questionable is Sterak's, which even then, is still a viable option for an ADC.

The Runaan, BORK, and Boots are good. BT and Lord Dominik's are both good situational buys.
